creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Red and brown striped ground; supplementary patterns include rows of zigzag/chevron motifs, rosettes in purple, violet, white and green; neck bound with floral ribbon.
medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
